title: Baby Carrier
description: red, green, blue silk applique; swirls and abstract motifs edged in raised white cotton tape; some edging yellow metal outlining; edged in tan tape that extends and crosses at bottom square (5x5\"); embroidered floral band on 3 sides; lined in blue cotton that extends beyond embroidered borders
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
